page.title: 13Health-Witton & Ridlington
page.content: There are no health centres,dental practices,chiropodists or chemist shops.Health care is shared between groups of doctors at N.Walsham,Stalham & Mundesley.Dental practices are in N.Walsham & Stalham;chiropodist at N.Walsham;a chiropodist visits village halls in districts surrounding Walcott & Happisburgh;Chemists available in N.Walsham & Stalham. {Hospitals}Cottage hospital at N.Walsham deals with geriatric patients,maternity patients & minor operations.Other cases are dealt with at the Cromer or Norwich Group of Hospitals.Health visitor is resident working partly from home.Home nursing equipment can be borrowed through the local Red Cross representative.Health care is centralised in the towns, involving country dwellers in much travelling.
